text:
UNIVERSITY OF MARYLAND
College Park
RADIO - TELEVISION DIVISION
DEPARTMENT OF SPEECH AND DRAMATIC ART
April 22, 1963
Miss Marion Corwell
School Relations
Dearborn Public Schools
5757 Neckel
Dearborn, Michigan
Dear Marion:
Thanks Jbr the re-welcome to the committee for 1963©..I hope to contribute
more than I did in 1962•••but we*11 see about that at the end of the yearo
As to the speakers Directory* • *I*ve had only slight knowledge about this
type of thing, and unfortunately can not seem to find a copy of any that
you mention© However, it does seem a most worthwhile endeavor, what with the
increse in interest in educational broadcasting* I am enclosing a copy of
the type of "roster" which we use at the University of Maryland© The in¬
formation for it is obtained by a very simple questionaaire**a copy
of which I can not find though it is not much more extensive than the in¬
formation which is published in the "roster*” A bibliographical sheet fe/cfiro
is also completed periodically, which is duplicated for the use of the '
program chairmen who has requested one of the speakers in the roster*
So much I can now contribute*
Xes, I think a meeting in columbus would be a good idea***as for me,
I do plan to be there*.•and would think we might make use of an hour or two
for planning in person* Last year I questioned how a committee might
write a one minute spot***I think it did well* Let's do the same this
year with this project*
Sincerely,
Thomas J* Aylward
Assoc* *rof©
A Century of Democratic Opportunity in Higher Learning
